title: How to keep up to date with bill payments - Quora

response.answer_text: All of my bills are on auto pay through my credit card. There is nothing to keep up with except the card payments. And that is also set with a minimum auto pay from my checking account. The minimum is so that I avoid any late payments should I forget.

ALL of my household bills - are paid by automatically… by standing orders. The only thing I need to to - is make sure there’s enough cash in the account to cover what’s due to be taken out each month.
